short_summary: Launch ramp reconstruction at Moose Lake, MB.
description: The project includes the demolition of the existing launch ramp and the supply and installation of a new launch ramp complete with new pre-cast concrete pads and base material. Expected contract start date is: 2024-07-08. Expected contract end date is: 2024-11-18
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Launch Ramp Reconstruction at Moose Lake, Manitoba
#### Reference Information
- Reference Number: cb-414-34702977
- Amendment Number: 2
- Solicitation Number: 30005839

#### Tender Details
- **Publication Date**: June 12, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 26, 2024, at 14:00 Hours (CDT)
- **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction and National Defence)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Selective Tendering
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 8, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: November 18, 2024

#### Scope of Work
The project involves the demolition and removal of the existing launch ramp and the installation of a new launch ramp, complete with new pre-cast concrete pads and base material. The contractor must complete the work by November 18, 2024.

#### Exclusions
- This procurement is set aside from the international trade agreements under the provision for measures with respect to Indigenous peoples.
- Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) does not apply to this procurement.

#### Contractor Requirements
- Eligible bidders must be qualified contractors with experience in marine construction services.

#### Supporting Documents
- Tender Notice: Available at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40069/30005839---rfq.pdf
- Addendum 1: Available at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40069/30005839---addendum-1--addenda-1.pdf

#### Contact Information
- Name: Karen Dolan
- Email: DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
- Phone: (782) 377-7245
- Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick, E3C 2M6, Canada

#### Trade Agreements
- This procurement is governed by the Fisheries and Oceans Canada Acquisition Policy.

#### The project is part of the Government of Canada’s efforts to support Indigenous businesses and increase procurement opportunities in the maritime construction sector.
Available at: **https://www.getitdone2021.gc.ca**.
